original_text:
For in much wisdom is much vexation,
    and he who increases knowledge increases sorrow.
korean_text: 지혜가 많으면 번뇌도 많으니 지식을 더하는 자는 근심을 더하느니라

sentences.original_text: For in much wisdom is much vexation
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 많은 지혜에는 많은 번뇌가 있고

sentences.original_text: and he who increases knowledge increases sorrow.
